pkgmetadata.longdescription: Likelihood Estimation of Stochastic Volatility Models // Parameter estimation for stochastic volatility models using maximum likelihood. The latent log-volatility is integrated out of the likelihood using the Laplace approximation. The models are fitted via 'TMB' (Template Model Builder) (Kristensen, Nielsen, Berg, Skaug, and Bell (2016) doi:10.18637/jss.v070.i05).
